posts.post_content:

Prices include shipping as individual cards
Subtract $5 from the total if you buy a pair.
Subtract $7.50 from the total if you buy three.

Buy the four remaining cards for $95

Individual pricing is $32.50 for the two VG cards (BVG 3) 
and $37.50 for the VG+ cards (BVG 3.5)

This is a particularly (well centered) attractive lot if you like portraits with red backgrounds (2), and less so if you prefer torsos with yellow backgrounds (2).;)

There is room in my PM box for your order.

If you like the card but not the slab, I will crack the card out and ship it naked.

I guarantee that these cards have not been stored in my drawers.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=77180[/url]

Back to six with the addition of Harry Davis with particularly vibrant colors.

The centering on these puppies is outstanding in case you didn't notice.
